class profiles.models.ServiceProviderProfileBase(*args, **kwargs)¶

Abstract class

Statuses:

TRIAL - The user is on a trial subscription (and not paying fees). ACTIVE - The first payment for the subscription is successful. DELINQUENT - The subscription payment has failed, but the user is still in the grace period. SUSPENDED - The subscription has been terminated, usually due to a payment issue. UNSUBSCRIBED - The walker has unsubscribed from the service.

Parameters:
  • user_id (OneToOneField to User) – User
  • address (TextField) – Address
  • phone_number (CharField) – Phone number
  • avatar (ImageField) – Avatar
  • date_last_seen (DateTimeField) – Date last seen
  • subscription_status (CharField) – Subscription status
  • subscription_expiration_date (DateTimeField) – Subscription expiration date
